name: DROP (1StupidRat - Toxic Sasquatch)
description:
Drop is a game where you try and get as deep as possible without dying or hitting the impending death spikes above you!  

Try and get as high a score as possible, and reach the deepest of depths!

Made for UW Stout's 49 hr Game Jam Fall 2017 (+1 Bonus Screaming Cowboy Hour)

Kayleigh Callaway - Assistant to the Assistant of the Head of the Party Planning Committee / Programmer

Tim Schultz - Regional Manager / Lead Artist

Jake Anderson - Da Boss / Programmer

Rory Tisdel - Head of HR / Programmer / Level Design

Brendan PS Larson - Assistant to the Regional Manager / Crime Syndicate / Shadow Boss / Music and SFX / Programming
